title: Trump diz que Rússia e Ucrânia concluíram grande troca de prisioneiros
cleaned_sentences: Trump says Russia and Ukraine have completed a great exchange of prisoners United States President Donald Trump said on Friday that a large exchange of prisoners was completed between Russia and Ukraine.
"A great exchange of prisoners has just been completed between Russia and Ukraine ... Congratulations to both sides for this negotiation.
This can lead to something big ?
", Trump said in a post on the social Truth.
Ukraine sent a list of 1,000 prisoners of war to Russia in preparation for a great future exchange, a Ukrainian military intelligence authority said on Thursday.
An agreement to make this exchange was reached earlier this month in Istanbul during the first direct conversations between Russia and Ukraine in more than three years.
